AT.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
AT.description: Du musst dich besser schlagen als alle anderen vor dir. Damit dir das gelingt, gilt es, so viele Pokémon zu fangen, wie du kannst. Während deines Vorhabens, sie alle zu fangen und deinen Pokédex zu vervollständigen, bereist du die ganze Welt. Vielleicht gelingt es dir ja sogar eines Tages, alle Arenaleiter zu besiegen und ihnen ihre Orden abzunehmen!

BR.name: Pokémon™ Blue Version (Versão francês)
BR.description: Com músicas e gráficos clássicos, Pokémon Red Version e Pokémon Blue Version permanecem fiéis aos jogos originais lançados há quase 20 anos. É como jogar os jogos originais, mas agora você pode trocar e combater Pokémon com a comunicação local sem fio nos consoles da linha Nintendo 3DS! Relembre estes jogos clássicos ou os jogue pela primeira vez! Vivencie a jornada original que deu início ao fenômeno Pokémon há quase 20 anos, mas agora nos consoles da linha Nintendo 3DS como jogos para baixar! Reviva a sensação de pegar o seu primeiro Pokémon dos 150 originais, em jogos que contam com arte em pixels monocromáticos e fundo musical de 4 bits. Jogue no papel de Treinador de Pokémon e viaje em busca de criaturas incríveis chamadas Pokémon. Pegue, batalhe e troque Pokémon enquanto enfrenta Gym Leaders e tenta acabar com Team Rocket! Para pegar todos os 150 Pokémon originais, você precisa trocá-los com seus amigos através da comunicação local sem fio.

CA.name: Pokémon™ Blue Version (French Version)
CA.description: With classic graphics and music, Pokémon Red and Pokémon Blue Version stay true to the originals released nearly 20 years ago. You’ll feel like you’re playing them just as they were, but now you can trade and battle Pokémon using local wireless on the Nintendo 3DS family of systems! Revisit these timeless games, or play them for the first time! Experience the original journey that started the Pokémon phenomenon nearly 20 years ago, but now on the Nintendo 3DS family of systems as a digital download! Relive the feeling of catching your very first Pokémon from the original 150, complete with monochromatic pixel art and 4-bit background music. You’ll take on the role of a Pokémon Trainer and travel across the land searching for amazing creatures called Pokémon. Catch, battle, and trade as you face Gym Leaders and try to stop Team Rocket! If you want to catch the original 150 Pokémon, you’ll need to trade wirelessly with your friends.

BG.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
BG.description: You've got to be the very best, like no one ever was - and the only way to do that is by catching all the Pokémon you can! Your quest to catch 'em all and complete your Pokédex will take you all over the world, and maybe one day you'll even be able to defeat all the Gym Leaders and collect their badges!

ES.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
ES.description: Tu misión en este juego es llegar a ser el mejor Entrenador de todos los tiempos, para lo cual tendrás que capturar todos los Pokémon que puedas. Completar tu Pokédex te llevará a explorar rincones de todo el mundo. ¡Quizá algún día logres derrotar a todos los Líderes de Gimnasio y obtener sus medallas!

BE.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
BE.description: Lancez-vous dans une quête épique pour devenir le meilleur dresseur ! Le meilleur moyen d'y arriver, c'est de capturer tous les Pokémon sur votre chemin ! Voyagez de ville en ville pour compléter votre Pokédex, et un jour, qui sait, vous arriverez peut-être à vaincre tous les Champions et à récupérer leurs Badges !

MX.name: Pokémon™ Edición Azul (Versión francés)
MX.description: Al retener los gráficos y la música original, Pokémon Edición Roja y Pokémon Edición Azul son fieles a las versiones originales lanzadas hace casi 20 años. Es como jugarlas tal y como eran, ¡pero ahora podrás intercambiar y enfrentarte a Pokémon a través de la comunicación inalámbrica local de las consolas de la familia Nintendo 3DS! ¡Juégalas! ¡Vive la aventura original que desató el fenómeno Pokémon hace casi 20 años, pero esta vez a través de una descarga digital para la familia de consolas Nintendo 3DS! Siente la emoción de capturar tu primer Pokémon de los 150 originales, mostrados en pixeles monocromáticos y con música de fondo de 4 bits. Asume el papel de un entrenador Pokémon y viaja a través de la región en busca de criaturas maravillosas llamadas Pokémon. ¡Captura, combate, intercambia, enfréntate a líderes de gimnasio y detén a Team Rocket! Para obtener los 150 Pokémon, deberás intercambiar localmente con tus amigos mediante la comunicación inalámbrica.

NL.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
NL.description: Je moet en zal de allerbeste zijn, zoals niemand ooit tevoren. En de enige manier om dat te bereiken is door alle Pokémon te vangen! Jouw missie om ze allemaal te vangen, en je Pokédex te voltooien zal je naar alle uithoeken van de wereld brengen, en misschien zal het je zelfs ooit lukken om alle Gym Leaders te verslaan en hun Badges te verzamelen!

SE.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
SE.description: You've got to be the very best, like no one ever was - and the only way to do that is by catching all the Pokémon you can! Your quest to catch 'em all and complete your Pokédex will take you all over the world, and maybe one day you'll even be able to defeat all the Gym Leaders and collect their badges!

FR.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
FR.description: Lancez-vous dans une quête épique pour devenir le meilleur dresseur ! Le meilleur moyen d'y arriver, c'est de capturer tous les Pokémon sur votre chemin ! Voyagez de ville en ville pour compléter votre Pokédex, et un jour, qui sait, vous arriverez peut-être à vaincre tous les Champions et à récupérer leurs Badges !

RU.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
RU.description: Если ты хочешь стать лучшим из лучших, то тебя ждет нелегкий путь, так как тебе нужно будет поймать столько покемонов, сколько сможешь! На вашем пути, чтобы поймать их всех и заполнить ваш Покедекс, вы побываете во всех точках мира, и, кто знает, может однажды сможете победить всех лидеров спортзалов и собрать коллекцию из их жетонов!

SI.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
SI.description: You've got to be the very best, like no one ever was - and the only way to do that is by catching all the Pokémon you can! Your quest to catch 'em all and complete your Pokédex will take you all over the world, and maybe one day you'll even be able to defeat all the Gym Leaders and collect their badges!

PT.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
PT.description: Tens de ser mais que perfeito, maior do que a imaginação... e a única maneira de o conseguires é apanhando todos os Pokémon! A tua missão de apanhá-los todos e completar o teu Pokédex irá levar-te à volta do mundo. Talvez um dia consigas derrotar todos os líderes de ginásio e colecionar os seus crachás!

RO.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
RO.description: You've got to be the very best, like no one ever was - and the only way to do that is by catching all the Pokémon you can! Your quest to catch 'em all and complete your Pokédex will take you all over the world, and maybe one day you'll even be able to defeat all the Gym Leaders and collect their badges!

IT.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
IT.description: Devi diventare imbattibile, come nessun altro prima di te! E l'unico modo per farlo è catturare tutti i Pokémon che puoi! La tua missione, che ti porterà in giro per il mondo, è completare il Pokédex. Forse un giorno riuscirai anche a sconfiggere tutti i Capipalestra e a collezionare le loro Medaglie!

ZA.name: Pokémon™ Version Bleue
ZA.description: You've got to be the very best, like no one ever was - and the only way to do that is by catching all the Pokémon you can! Your quest to catch 'em all and complete your Pokédex will take you all over the world, and maybe one day you'll even be able to defeat all the Gym Leaders and collect their badges!
